pages.text: uballighukum risalati rabbi wa-ana lakum nasihun aminun

awaʿajib'tum an jaakum dhik'run min rabbikum ʿala rajulin minkum liyundhirakum wa-udh'kuru idh jaʿalakum khulafaa min baʿdi qawmi nuhin wazadakum fi l-khalqi bas'tatan fa-udh'kuru alaa l-lahi laʿallakum tuf'lihuna
qalu aji'tana linaʿbuda l-laha wahdahu wanadhara ma kana yaʿbudu abauna fatina bima taʿiduna in kunta mina l-sadiqina
qala qad waqaʿa ʿalaykum min rabbikum rij'sun waghadabun atujadilunani fi asmain sammaytumuha antum waabaukum ma nazzala l-lahu biha min sul'tanin fa-intaziru inni maʿakum mina l-muntazirina
fa-anjaynahu wa-alladhina maʿahu birahmatin minna waqataʿna dabira alladhina kadhabu biayatina wama kanu mu'minina

wa-ila thamuda akhahum salihan qala yaqawmi uʿ'budu l-laha ma lakum min ilahin ghayruhu qad jaatkum bayyinatun min rabbikum hadhihi naqatu l-lahi lakum ayatan fadharuha takul fi ardi l-lahi wala tamassuha bisuin fayakhudhakum ʿadhabun alimun
